translations: 运转正常的，有效的；手术的；（词）最重要的，关键的
技工，工人；密探，（尤指政府的）特工人员

sentences.sentence: The station will be fully operative again in January.
sentences.translation: 该站将于一月份全部恢复运营。

sentences.sentence: I was in love with her—'was' being the operative word.
sentences.translation: 在I was in love with her这句话中，was是关键词。
